H0.text: What old English coin took its name from being a quarter of a penny. Quart

H1.text: What old English coin took its name from being a quarter of a penny. Quarterling

H2.text: What old English coin took its name from being a quarter of a penny. Penniquart

H3.text: What old English coin took its name from being a quarter of a penny. Farthing

A4.text: Farthing (British coin), an old British coin valued one quarter of a penny
